portlet-preference.name: tips
portlet-preference.value: The Service Desk can answer technical questions at (555) 555-5555 or servicedesk@apereo.org
When using a public computer, don't forget to sign out, or close the browser, when you're done
Quarters to semesters questions? Ask your advisor or visit the Student Help Center
New portlets can be added to your layout by clicking on 'Customize'
Many portlets can be moved dragging and dropping the portlet's header
Some portlets have configurable options (click on the gear icon in their header)
You can remove an unwanted portlet by clicking on the X in the portlet's header
Some portlets have more features if you focus on them by using the arrow icon in their header
This portal has a mobile interface for iPhones and Droids (you can use uPortal from your phone)
'Customize < Layouts' allows you change the number of columns on a tab
'Add Tab' lets you create your own tab on which you can put any portlets you want
The Service Desk can reset your layout
Gmail users -- you can preview your Gmail in the portal
The Weather portlet lets you add other locations, so you can dream of vacationing in Hawaii or Aspen
Bug reports are always appreciated -- use http://issues.jasig.org
The email summary portlet can read and delete messages, but not reply to, or compose new, messages
The email summary portlet can show there are attachments, but cannot show you the contents of an attachment
The email summary portlet's 'Inbox' link will take you to your email service's web-based mail client
This portal is built on uPortal, which is open-source software to which many leading universities contribute
